gcci.text: H100 supply chain bottlenecks are easing as US-East availability improves, but ongoing capex commitments will determine long‑term chip availability.

gtpi.text: Token costs are falling sharply as API price wars intensify, with aggressive model distillation driving rapid efficiency gains at $1.35 per million tokens.

gagl.text: The 120 TWh annual load is straining the grid, making nuclear baseload essential to curb carbon footprint while supporting new GW‑scale clusters.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment remains cautiously optimistic amid consolidation, yet soaring valuations raise bubble concerns and spotlight the need for sustainable growth.
